extensionDescription.message: Adds a phishing report button to the toolbar.

reportButtonHelp.message: Reports suspicious E-Mails. Select the E-Mail and then click this button to forward it to the IT security department.

optionsActionJunk.message: move it to the junk folder

optionsActionTrash.message: delete it (move to the trash folder)

optionsSMTPRecipientLabel.message: E-Mail address to send reports to

reportCommentPrompt.message: The selected E-Mail will be forwarded to your security team.

reportCommentJunk.message: It will then be moved to your junk folder.

reportError.message: Reporting failed, please try again later.

simulationAckSuccessBody.message: You reported a suspicious E-Mail that is part of our phishing training campaign. Thank you!

updateNotificationU2DBody.message: You are already using the latest version of

updateNotificationAvailableInstr.message: For instructions on how to upgrade, please visit
